extendedInfo.description: Magical worldï¼powerful props and cool drifting, come here and have a race on our Mole Kart.Various race tracks, different choices of karts, interesting props and dreadful monsters!  All in one game!Freezing glaciers, hot volcanoes, and sky remains; each drifting and racing on these tracks is a test for your courage and brainpower.Game features:(1)	Different Mole characters with distinctive personalities will come together to battle it out in an adrenaline-fueled race with you , donât look down on them.(2)	Various free tracks for you to choose. You can gallop in the wide, beautiful, and exciting racing tracks.(3)	Each kart has its own features. Whether you are driving auto or manual, you will be thrilled and entertained.(4)	Countless props, gears, and monsters are waiting for you.Please continue to follow us, more exciting gameplay will come soon!

reviews.title: Should add more characters, new tracks
reviews.comment: Excelent but they need to add  more characters and new tracks. The game is great and also graphics
reviews.author: Silver Wind

reviews.title: Good copy
reviews.comment: This is a pretty good copy of Mario Kart. The only problem with it is the controls. Please update and fix them! It could also be a bit smoother! Good game otherwise.
reviews.author: Rafael Arredondo

reviews.title: Droidhen...
reviews.comment: i really like how Mole Kart is like Mario Kart... ON THE GO! Now if only they would do the same for the original Nintendo Mario game. that would be awesome!
reviews.author: Dianna R.

reviews.title: Its ok
reviews.comment: Total rip off from some Mario Kart tracks but its still abit of fum to pass the time. Makes me want to dust off the old Wii though!
reviews.author: Peter Georgiou

reviews.title: Mangla Media
reviews.comment: Great racing game like... well you know the one I\'m thinking of ;-) Great SFX, Visuals & controls are pretty good too but could do with the odd tweak & some online play would be a brilliant idea as well as a link to FB or some online leaderboard like Heyzap or Scoreloop just don\'t use OpenFeint as that is the worst as it doesn\'t work now days.
reviews.author: Richard Mordew

reviews.title: Must Exit After Race
reviews.comment: After race, touching Play again or Change track does nothing. Some text is cut off. I assume these issues are screen sized related. Perhaps my 3.5\" screen is too small for the app. Perhaps the app supports a minimum of 4\" screens. Would like manual acceleration. I often drive off bridges or crash into green slime creatures.
reviews.author: Wei Lun Li

reviews.title: GREAT GAME!
reviews.comment: A copy of Mario Kart Wii, but a great game. Wish there were more characters and courses. Recommend to download!
reviews.author: Randomyoshi Momoyoshi

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: I found this game to be enjoyable. Obviously it is pretty much Mario Kart, which isnt a bad thing. The controls aren\'t too bad, i think if you spaced the arrows farther apart it would be better, and if you make this where you can use the xperia gamepad than that would be really neat. Overall the game isn\'t bad, but if you had multiplayer it would be better, and fixed minor problems. But I would recommend that people give this game a try.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not even 1 star
reviews.comment: I played this game (which i cant cus it stops all the time) because i thought it looked fun but it really really isnt.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just like mario kart!
reviews.comment: If you like mario kart then you will love this game. There are little bugs that need to get fixed like making a jump from a mushroom smoother but still a great game!
reviews.author: Philip Castaldo

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Its cool but needs improvements. Needs more characters and more stages. Needs a grand prix mode with a points system. be cool if the item blocks would rotate in place. You need to be able to stop the item roulette when needed. Hoping their willbe a rank system in the multiplayer and not just vsing players locally. Fun game tho
reviews.author: Maan Barhoum

reviews.title: Cuppy cake
reviews.comment: \304\260t\'s so good.like mario kart it is the best
reviews.author: Leonard Rabino

reviews.comment: I like this game. Although there aren\'t many levels or characters, they are still fun. The levels are basically exactly the same as Mario kart on the Wii, the graphics aren\'t great but better than a lot of games. If you give us more levels and characters, this would definitely be a five star!
reviews.author: Maisy P

reviews.title: Great game on s3
reviews.comment: This game is so responsive with the giro on the s3, great graphics, kids love it. I had this on my x iphone, Its sooo much better on s3 than on the iphone.
reviews.author: Gustavo Magalhaes

reviews.title: Adam
reviews.comment: This game is abso lutely rubbish the graphics are to slow the controls take to long to respond and it the multiplayer has been under construction for Farr to long.Also it takes ages to load up at start .DO NOT GET!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Kart Racing on Android
reviews.comment: I\'m not a big fan of racing games, but kart racing is a fun way to pass the time. This is the best kart racer on the Play Store. It\'s very similar to *cough* Mario Kart *cough* but that\'s why it\'s so much fun!!!
reviews.author: Ryann Curton

reviews.title: Good free android kart racer
reviews.comment: At least This kart racer doesnt try to sell you items like some do.
reviews.author: Arliss Arliss

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: This is really fun, but needs some work. It would be good if you could change tilt sensitivity. Also it is annoying how when you get hit you completely stop. Also there are many grammatical errors.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty lazy!
reviews.comment: Nice graphics. I guess. But shame on you for ripping every track STRAIGHT from Mario Kart Wii. Taking the work of others and calling it your own. Terrible. Shame on you devs. Also, the controls are terrible and the voices are awful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Very amazing game. Levels are just like mario kart wii nice and cute character sprites everythingblooks cartoony the only thing that would make this better is more racing maps, finishing your multiplayer maps and time trials for practice. Also more characters and also fixing up MANUAL DRIFT.
reviews.author: Aj Miles
